text: Seahawks win NFC West, earn NFC’s top seed in playoffs after handling 49ers - The Seattle Times
fullText: The Seahawks showed why they might be back at Levi's Stadium next month for the Super Bowl after beating the 49ers 13-3 to win the NFC West title and top seed in the NFC.

text: Iran's leader says rioters 'must be put in their place' as protest death toll rises to at least 10 - PBS
